extendedInfo.description: Can't wait for the new Call of Duty: Black Ops 2? Need to improve your score or K/D? Black Ops 2 Guide will satisfy your craving. Black Ops 2 Guide is the Best app for Black Ops 2 Info on the market!Black Ops 2 Guide Contains:**LATEST WEAPONS****DETAILED INFORMATION AND PICTURES ON ALL THE WEAPONS****ALL THE PERKS!!!****LATEST ATTACHMENTS****DETAILED INFORMATION AND PICTURES ON ALL THE ATTACHMENTS****HOTTEST NEWS SITES FOR BLACK OPS 2****VIDEOS****50+ SCREENSHOTS****MUSICPLAYER****OVER 15 WALLPAPERS**...and much more!!!Remember, we are a company dedicated to users! All user input will be greatly appreciated. We will add the things YOU want! You can submit a suggestion, criticism, or idea in the Extras section.**Copyright Disclaimer** Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."Presented under fair use for educational purposes.Credits go to Call of Duty. All trademarks, copyrights go to Activision and Treyarch.

reviews.title: A decent basic guide...
reviews.comment: ...but I\'d like to see some strategy/tips & tricks, and some numbers to understand damage and fire rates for each weapon. Also, it\'d be cool to see links to Wikipedia regarding the actual weapons that are represented in game.
reviews.author: Chris Jones

reviews.title: It\'s a good start to a great app!
reviews.comment: The layout is nice and simple! I think it can be a five star app if some of the info was updated,  and provide us with a strategy guide, list of achievements, secrets, and hints in separate categories for each of the game modes that you could page through as you progress in the game! I can appreciate the time and work the developers put into creating apps, keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesomr app for when im out n about, would love to see maybe a rating system after you have created a class , it would be hard to do or even a pros and cons list ie the class you have created is quick at aiming, stealthed , high damage or somthing like that and maybe some more.music
